contents:
美國那個kol議員所羅門直指這次是人為泄漏
由中國間諜偷走加拿大病毒樣本

Two complete virus genomes ([HKU-SZ]-002a andHKU-SZ-005b) were sequenced using Nanopore technology and showed a novel coronavirus that is most closely related to those of the bat SARS-like coronavirus bat-SL-CoVZXC21 (NCBI accession number MG772934) and bat-SL-CoVZC45 (NCBI accession number MG772933). Their genome organisation is typical of a lineage B betacoronavirus.

疑似係港大(HKU)將香港03沙士樣本送往深圳(SZ)港大醫院
再從美加等大型實驗定得到既新致病蛋白
在法國提供技術既武漢P4實驗室反覆實驗結合
